name: cyclops (Xyterix)
description:
cyclops is a multitasking game in which you must stabilize the cyclops in an attempt to blend into society. Unfortunately, the cyclops might be a little sick... and a little weird.

  • A/D to keep the head balanced
  • Mouse over circles to keep staring
  • Click either mouse buttons to hold back a sneeze
  • Press spacebar at the right time to slurp up snot
